title: Attendance Monitoring App
description: The Attendance Monitoring System is built using TypeScript, Angular, Ionic Framework as front end and Cloud Firestore as back end. It provides its users with the option to register as admin, student, or teacher. The admins can register directly, while the students or teachers have to register using an admin UID, which will be provided by the admin.

title: Notes Making
description: The Notes Making is a notes storage web application utilizing local browser storage through JavaScript. Implemented note search functionality in the navigation bar and enabled users to delete saved notes.
